#summary LOST Room Node Hardware page.

= Introduction =

The board is organized around an ATMega8L.
[http://lebomb-home-system-terminal.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/LOST_Nodes/romm/Hw/images/Room_Hw_Top.jpg]

= Details =

As you can see on the picture, the board has:
  * A micro-controller ATMega8L
  * Power function
  ** A power regulator DC-DC 12V to 5V. Ref : TEL 5-1211
  ** A power regulation 12V to 9 V. Ref 78L05
  * An RJ45 connector:
  ** I2C bus
  ** 12V Power
  *
